segments.text: I am observing an indoor kitchen scene, a simple line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing at the sink, busy drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is slightly turned, and she seems completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the faucet is running, and the sink is utterly overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how much water is pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle has already formed on the floor, creeping under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually submerged in the water, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad thinking about the water damage this will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is streaming down the cabinet doors, relentless and unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an odd sight, this calm domesticity amidst an impending mini-flood.
segments.speaker: PAR
